title: FAKER WARDS PLZ
body:
Riot please make a ward skin that is a faker head on top of a worlds trophy.
 
(maybe the head could even rotate to watch you)

replies.body: lmao that's creepy and awesome at the same time.
make it manically laugh as a robot overlord whilst it turns
Great idea panda of the party train {{champion:53}}
or even better yet a broccoli ward skin :D

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jfFJ5iPy,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-14T14:37:02.399+0000)
>
> or even better yet a broccoli ward skin :D

or a Kappa XD ward skin
So it can hide on bush.
just faker senpai creeping on u lol
sounds dirpy and awesome at same time
